title: Sci-Fi Sounds and Loops Vol.4
description: "Sci-Fi Textures and Loops" are unique sound effects in WAV 24 Bit 96 kHz format that are suitable for creating a dark, mysterious, alien atmosphere.
longDescription:
Audio Demo

"Sci-Fi Textures and Loops" are unique sound effects in WAV 24 Bit 96 kHz format that are suitable for creating a dark, mysterious, alien atmosphere.


"Sci-Fi Textures and Loops Vol. 4" includes sound effects such as:


• Sci-Fi Background Horror Atmospheric

• Sci-Fi Chaotic Breathing Effect

• Sci-Fi Funny Effect

• Sci-Fi Glass

• Sci-Fi Horror Anxiety

• Sci-Fi Metal Soundscape

• Sci-Fi Noise

• Sci-Fi Radio Noise

• Sci-Fi Scanning Drone

• Sci-Fi Siren

• Sci-Fi Sonar


Each sound effect of this sample pack has 10 variations of different pitches, loop and non-loop versions.


Product Details:

• 230 WAV files

• 96kHz/24Bit

• 1.43 GB
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 230

Number of Audio Cues: 230

Sample rate / bit rate: 96000 Hz

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Sci-Fi Textures and Loops Vol.4 - Sound-List
